title: Private bed, private bath for rent. Close to BART!
posting_body: ["Hello, we're seeking a clean, responsible, and quiet housemate in a 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo in the heart of San Leandro starting either August 15 or September 1, 2022.", "You'll be staying in a spacious room (12x12) with your own bathroom, and sharing the living room with two other housemates.", 'The existing tenants are moving out in August, so the living room will be cleaned up without the boxes.', "With regards to your room, you'll have a good amount of closet space and it definitely fits a queen size bed with plenty of space left.", "There's a washer and dryer attached in the unit, which is shared, as well as the kitchen and patio.", 'The location is ideal as it is:', '1) Only FOUR minutes walk to San Leandro Bart station!', '(25 minutes to San Francisco downtown!)', '2) Located in a quiet neighborhood and gated community', '3) One block away from Safeway, CVS, plenty of restaurants, USPS, banks (Chase, BOA, etc.), Costco are all nearby as well', '4) Only 10 minute access to the 580/880 highway', 'Requirements:', '1) Minimum ONE-YEAR lease.', "In addition to the first month's rent upon move in, will also require a one-month rent deposit that will be refunded (if the space is in the same condition) when you leave", '2) Utilities (Electric, heating, internet, water) will be split equally by three', '3) Tell me a little bit about yourself in your email.', 'Please include your reason for rent, occupation including where you work and your schedule, daily activities, interests/hobbies.', '4) If everything works out after looking at the place, I will require pay stubs/credit reports/references if necessary', "5) Lastly, we're NOT looking for a housemate who will bring overnight guests, smokes, hosts house parties, drinks excessively, and do drugs", 'A little about your housemates:', 'You will be living with 2 professionals (20s).', 'One is a software developer working remotely and the other is a teacher that will be gone during regular school hours.', 'We often leave for the weekends/holidays to visit family.', 'We enjoy company and like to get to know our housemates.', 'Thank you.']
